column1: Smoque BBQ////The family and I really enjoyed this great BBQ joint.   I had a sliced brisket basket
column2: and thought the meat was the best I've had in a long time.  I tried a sample of my family's ribs and sausage.  The meat was extremely well prepared and delicious
column3: though the ribs weren't as tender as I've had elsewhere.  The meat is definitely the main event here -- and it was wonderfully well smoked and delicious.
